main event: A UFO was reported in Vandalia, Ohio on multiple occasions in July 1965, with witnesses describing an object that was circular, silvery in color, and larger than normal aircraft.
interesting points: The sightings lasted from 3 minutes to 30 minutes.,Witnesses reported two lights, one white and one red, during one of the sightings.,Accounts from multiple witnesses described similar characteristics of the object.,The object displayed characteristics consistent with unidentified aerial devices.,One report concluded that a sighted object was likely a satellite, and another was considered normal aircraft.
witness description: A superintendent from the Ohio Department of Highways and several residents in the area reported sightings.
